Class JettyStop

  • java.lang.Object

          • org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.JettyStop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Task>, org.gradle.api.internal.DynamicObjectAware, org.gradle.api.internal.IConventionAware, org.gradle.api.internal.TaskInternal, ExtensionAware, Task, org.gradle.util.Configurable<Task>
    Deprecated. 
    The Jetty plugin has been deprecated

    @Deprecated
public class JettyStop
extends org.gradle.api.internal.ConventionTask
    Stops the embedded Jetty web container, if it is running.
